import pymel.core
import pymel.core.windows
import beastUtils

BEAST_MENU_NAME         = "beastMenu"

def popupOnError(f):
        try:
                f()
        except pymel.core.language.MelError as e:
                beastUtils.messageBox('critical', str(e))
                raise e

class BeastMenu:

        def __init__(self):
                self.name = BEAST_MENU_NAME
                pymel.core.windows.setParent("MayaWindow")
                if not pymel.core.windows.menu(BEAST_MENU_NAME, query=True, exists=True):
                        self.beastMenu = pymel.core.windows.menu(BEAST_MENU_NAME, label="Beast", postMenuCommand=self.onPopulateBeastMenu)

        def destroy(self):
                if hasattr(self, "beastMenu"):
                        pymel.core.windows.deleteUI(self.beastMenu)

        def onPopulateBeastMenu(self, *args):
                pymel.core.windows.menu(self.beastMenu, deleteAllItems=True, e=True)
                pymel.core.windows.setParent(self.beastMenu, menu=True)

                pymel.core.windows.menuItem(label="Settings...", command=pymel.core.windows.Callback(self.onSettings))
                pymel.core.windows.menuItem(divider=True)

                if not pymel.core.mel.beastIsLive():
                        pymel.core.windows.menuItem(label="Start Live Render", command=pymel.core.windows.Callback(popupOnError, pymel.core.mel.beastRenderLive))
                        pymel.core.windows.menuItem(label="Start Live Bake", command=pymel.core.windows.Callback(popupOnError, pymel.core.mel.beastBakeLive))
                else:
                        pymel.core.windows.menuItem(label="Stop Live", command=pymel.core.windows.Callback(popupOnError, pymel.core.mel.beastRenderLive)) #

                pymel.core.windows.menuItem(divider=True)
                pymel.core.windows.menuItem(label="Final Render", command=pymel.core.windows.Callback(popupOnError, pymel.core.mel.beastRenderFinal))
                pymel.core.windows.menuItem(label="Final Bake", command=pymel.core.windows.Callback(popupOnError, pymel.core.mel.beastBakeFinal))
                pymel.core.windows.menuItem(divider=True)
                pymel.core.windows.menuItem(label="New Target", command=pymel.core.windows.Callback(self.onNewTarget, False))
                self.editTargetMenu = pymel.core.windows.subMenuItem(label="Edit Target", postMenuCommand=self.onPopulateEditTargetMenu)
                pymel.core.windows.setParent("..", menu=True)
                self.addToTargetMenu = pymel.core.windows.subMenuItem(label="Add To Target", postMenuCommand=self.onPopulateAddToTargetMenu)
                pymel.core.windows.setParent("..", menu=True)
                pymel.core.windows.menuItem(divider=True)
                pymel.core.windows.menuItem(label="New Pass", command=self.onNewPass)
                self.editPassMenu = pymel.core.windows.subMenuItem(label="Edit Pass", postMenuCommand=self.onPopulatePassMenu)
                pymel.core.windows.setParent("..", menu=True)
                pymel.core.windows.menuItem(divider=True)
                pymel.core.windows.menuItem(label="UV Unwrap", command=pymel.core.windows.Callback(popupOnError, self.onUVUnwrap))
                pymel.core.windows.menuItem(optionBox=True, command=pymel.core.windows.Callback(pymel.core.mel.performBeastUVUnwrap, 1))

        def onSettings(self):
                pymel.core.mel.showEditor("beastSettings")

        def onUVUnwrap(self):
                pymel.core.mel.performBeastUVUnwrap(0)

        def onNewTarget(self, addSelection=False):
                members = []
                if addSelection is True:
                        members = pymel.core.general.ls(long=True, selection=True, type="dagNode")
                newTarget = pymel.core.general.createNode("beastTarget")
                print "Created new Beast target:", newTarget
                if addSelection is True:
                        pymel.core.general.sets(str(newTarget), addElement=members)
                # connect defaultBeastPass
                pymel.core.general.connectAttr("defaultBeastPass.targets", str(newTarget) + ".passes", nextAvailable=True)
                pymel.core.mel.showEditor(newTarget)

        def onNewPass(self, *args):
                newPass = pymel.core.general.createNode("beastPass")
                print "Created new Beast pass:", newPass
                pymel.core.mel.showEditor(newPass)

        def onPopulateAddToTargetMenu(self, *args):
                # delete old items
                pymel.core.windows.menu(self.addToTargetMenu, deleteAllItems=True, e=True)
                pymel.core.windows.setParent(self.addToTargetMenu, menu=True)
                pymel.core.windows.menuItem(label="New Target", command=pymel.core.windows.Callback(self.onNewTarget, True))
                pymel.core.windows.menuItem(divider=True)
                targets = pymel.core.general.ls(type="beastTarget")
                for target in targets:
                        pymel.core.windows.menuItem(label=target, command=pymel.core.windows.Callback(self.onAddToTarget, target))

        def onPopulateEditTargetMenu(self, *args):
                # delete old items
                pymel.core.windows.menu(self.editTargetMenu, deleteAllItems=True, e=True)
                pymel.core.windows.setParent(self.editTargetMenu, menu=True)
                targets = pymel.core.general.ls(type="beastTarget")
                for target in targets:
                        pymel.core.windows.menuItem(label=target, command=pymel.core.windows.Callback(pymel.core.mel.showEditor, target))

        def onAddToTarget(self, target):
                members = pymel.core.general.ls(long=True, selection=True, type="dagNode")
                pymel.core.general.sets(str(target), addElement=members)

        def onPopulatePassMenu(self, *args):
                pymel.core.windows.menu(self.editPassMenu, deleteAllItems=True, e=True)
                pymel.core.windows.setParent(self.editPassMenu, menu=True)
                passes = pymel.core.general.ls(type="beastPass")
                for p in passes:
                        pymel.core.windows.menuItem(label=p, command=pymel.core.windows.Callback(pymel.core.mel.showEditor, p))
